          <title>
            <string language="en">Force diagram of a wheelbarrow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftdiagramm eines Wheelbarrow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme de force d'une brouette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama da força de um wheelbarrow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema della forza di una carriola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα δύναμης wheelbarrow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama de la fuerza de una carretilla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the force diagram of a wheelbarrow. This can be used as an exercise to calculate forces acting on the wheelbarrow.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lever</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Moment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pivot point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wheelbarrow</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Kraftdiagramm eines 
Wheelbarrow. Dieses kann als Übung verwendet werden, um die 
Kräfte zu errechnen, die auf dem Wheelbarrow fungieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le diagramme de force 
d'une brouette. Ceci peut être employé comme exercice pour 
calculer des forces agissant sur la brouette.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o diagrama da força de 
um wheelbarrow. Isto pode ser usado como um exercício calcular 
as forças que agem no wheelbarrow.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra lo schema della forza
di una carriola. Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione per 
calcolare le forze che si comportano sulla carriola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει διάγραμμα δύναμης 
wheelbarrow. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση για 
να υπολογίσει τις δυνάμεις ενεργώντας wheelbarrow.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el diagrama de la fuerza
de una carretilla. Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio para 
calcular las fuerzas que actúan en la carretilla.</string>
          </description>
